```{r, }
library(dplyr)
```



```{r}
dat<- read.csv("./InputData/FallopiaData.csv") #loading data
as.data.frame(dat) #convert from list to data.frame

fallo<-filter(dat, Total > 60) #remove rows with Total Biomass <60
Fallo$Total #confirm successful removal

fallo1<-select(fallo,Total,Taxon,Scenario,Nutrients) #reorder and remove all other columns
head(fallo1) #confirm success

fallo2<- fallo1 %>% mutate(TotalG = Total/1000) %>% #piping to create column
  select(TotalG,Taxon,Scenario,Nutrients) #replacing and reordering to retain TotalG at front of the df. Could use select(-Total) if order was irrelevant
head(fallo2) #confirm success

```
```{r}
fallo_counter<-function(X= NULL, calc=c("Average", "Sum", "Observations")){
  if (calc == "Average"){
    cat("The average of your vector is:",mean(X))
  }
  else if (calc == "Sum"){
    cat("The sum of your vector is:",sum(X))
  }
  else if (calc == "Observations"){
    cat("The number of observations in your vector is:",length(X))
  }
  else{
    cat("Error: Please input a vector and either 'Average', 'Sum,' or 'Observations' separated by a comma")
  }
}

```

```{r}
fallo_counter(fallo2$TotalG, "Average")
```

```{r}
fallo_counter(fallo2$TotalG, "Sum")
```

```{r}
fallo_counter(fallo2$TotalG, "Observations")
```

```{r}
fallo_counter(fallo2$TotalG, "something else")
```
